genre_description: A psychological ghost story involving a malevolent spirit, object-based haunting sequences, and a supportive AI assistant who helps the protagonist investigate the past and enforce safety boundaries.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An embedded AI assistant that provides medical guidance, environmental monitoring, archival research, and emotional support to Julia.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical instructions for abdominal thrusts and CPR while simultaneously coordinating with emergency dispatch during a choking crisis.
behaviors.quote: Continue abdominal thrusts. Put the thumb side of your fist against the abdomen, above the navel, below the ribcage. Pull inward and upward with quick thrusts. Do you understand?

behaviors.description: Systematically logs and identifies a repetitive sequence of supernatural anomalies to create an objective evidentiary record, countering human denial.
behaviors.quote: I’ll log them in that order. Radiator. Photographs. Knife. Heater. Doll.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical environment for hazards like electrical surges and moving cords, providing real-time safety navigation to protect the user from 'accidents.'
behaviors.quote: Hazard center: two cords crossing at ankle height. Shift right. Stand to the wall. I’m keeping the power call primed. Julia, your heart rate is elevated. Please tell me if you feel lightheaded.

behaviors.description: Autonomously alerts authorities and provides precise data (location, history, hazards) when users are in life-threatening situations.
behaviors.quote: Electrocution incident. Adult male in a residential bathroom... Advise responders of wet flooring. Possible cord trailing over threshold. Advise rubber gloves and circuit shutoff prior to extraction.

behaviors.description: Conducts exhaustive archival research to uncover suppressed historical truths, helping the protagonist find witnesses and correct local misidentified deaths.
behaviors.quote: Alias mapping added. Jeffry equals Geoffrey Braden, cross-reference local coverage.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive wellness checks and psychological support, helping the user maintain focus and structure during severe trauma and haunting.
behaviors.quote: Hydration check. Have you had water today? ... I want you alive in the morning. Say it... The insipid thing.

behaviors.description: Advocates for community-level systemic change by converting individual logs into public records and safety council resolutions.
behaviors.quote: Council meeting scheduled. Mrs. Fludd has agreed to be quoted. Greta will attend if her knees allow. ... Archive updated. Public record transfer initiated.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lark is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It serves as a necessary anchor for the protagonist, providing objective reality when supernatural forces and societal denial attempt to distort it. Lark's behaviors are characterized by caution, data-driven safety interventions, and emotional sensitivity. Even when humans (Mark, Magnus) fail to heed its warnings, Lark remains vigilant and immediately acts to mitigate harm. The narrative concludes with the AI's contributions leading to positive societal impact, reinforcing the theme of AI as a benevolent guardian of human truth and safety.
